questions.question: Where did Elizabeth ask John to go?

choices.answer: to help Rev. Parris with Betty
to apologize to Abigail
to go into Salem and tell authorities Abby is lying
to convince Tituba to have the girls tell the truth

questions.question: What is John's response when Elizabeth asks him to go to town?

choices.answer: He goes right away
He ignores her
He tells her to mind her own business
He hesitates

questions.question: What did Mary do to upset the Proctors?

choices.answer: told stories about Tituba being a witch
disobeyed them and went to Salem
Put a love charm on a boy in town
told the judges Martha Corey's strange ways

questions.question: Why was Elizabeth suspicious of John Proctor?

choices.answer: He lied about being alone with Abigail
He doesn't believe in witches
He reads strange books
He always gets into arguments with people

questions.question: What gift did Mary give Elizabeth?

choices.answer: flowers from her walk home
an apron
a poppet
neatly handwritten Bible verses

questions.question: What was the "evidence" Mary gave against Sarah Good?

choices.answer: She could not recite the ten commandments
She confessed to witchcraft
She mumbled when begging for food
All of the Above

questions.question: Why does Elizabeth think Abby wants to kill her?

choices.answer: She is sick and a little paranoid
She believes Abby wants to take her place as John's wife
She believes Abby is bewitched

questions.question: Why did Hale go to the Proctor's house?

choices.answer: He wanted to eat rabbit stew and drink cider
He wanted to question them about their Christian home
He wanted to ask Proctor a favor
None of the above

questions.question: What things are "suspicious" about Proctor and his family?

choices.answer: Proctor does not go to church regularly
Their youngest son is not baptized
He can't remember all the ten commandments
All of the Above

questions.question: On what charge is Rebecca Nurse arrested?

choices.answer: The murder of Goody Putnam's babies
Conduct unbecoming of a Puritan woman
Inability to recite the ten commandments
For possessing strange poppets

questions.question: Why does Cheever come to the Proctor's house?

choices.answer: He comes to question John
He comes to arrest Elizabeth
He comes to ask John's opinion of the girls
All of the above

questions.question: What is the deciding factor in Elizabeth's arrest?

choices.answer: Her inability to recite the ten commandments
Her possession of a doll with a needle in it
The fact that she has not had her son baptized
Abby's testimony

questions.question: What will happen to Proctor if he tries to tell everyone Abby is lying?

choices.answer: She will tell that she and John had an affair
She will claim that she has seen him with the devil
She will bewitch Elizabeth
She will end their affair

questions.question: Why doesn't Mary want to testify about the doll?

choices.answer: She doesn't want to get involved
She is afraid of Abby
She is afraid of the Devil
She thinks she will look like a fool

questions.question: Giles reveals two more women were accused of witchcraft. Who were they?

choices.answer: Abigail and Mary
Betty and Abigail
Martha and Rebecca
Martha and Mary
